complete_funding_main_text: Please select existing Stripe account or connect a new Stripe account to be used for receiving campaign funds.
complete_funding_bank_main_text: Please fill out the required Bank account information to be used for receiving campaign funds.
complete_funding_main_text2: Once done please click either the 'Save Changes' button to save your changes or the 'Next Step' button to save your changes and continue.
complete_funding_bank_note: Please provide your bank account information so you can receive the payment.
complete_funding_stripe_errormessage: Please select an account to proceed
complete_funding_bank_account_confirm_er: Please make sure this field matches
complete_funding_stripe_message1: Or Create a New Stripe Account/Connection:
complete_funding_stripe_direct_transacti: Direct Transaction Mode is on. Only admin can view this page.
complete_funding_stripe_connect_notes: Connect your Stripe account to this campaign in order to receive your payments. Click here for more information about connecting your stripe account.
complete_funding_stripe_connect_modal_co: Changing Stripe Settings on active post processing campaign with contributions could cause problems where your contributions won't get processed
